A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Being an avid Star Wars fan from the beginning\, I knew 5 minutes in I was not going to like this one. I tried really hard to look for something redeeming\, but thelonger it went on the more annoyed I became. I can picture arguments in the back room between Disney and the Director/Writers with Disney winning of course. I'm having a hard time thinking of this crap as \"Star Wars\" as it doesn't feel the same and the story line  and characters are just not that interetsing.
